title: PRIMARY PACKAGING
description:
The PRIMARY PACKAGING is packaging that will be in direct contact with a PRODUCT INGREDIENT, INTERMEDIATE DRUG PRODUCT, or DRUG PRODUCT during transport and storage.
This is PRIMARY PACKAGING without any print. The PRINT INFORMATION is managed separately.
[028-OCS-00283-RD01 (2.0): 2.9 Primary Packaging Material]
A PRIMARY PACKAGING may also be a DEVICE PART or a DEVICE.
In such case the resulting PRIMARY PACKED DRUG PRODUCT is a Drug-Device-Combination.

id.title: globalSkuId
id.description: The Global SKU ID is the globally unique identifier for the GLOBAL SKU. It is a six digit integer.

descriptions.title: descriptions
descriptions.description: The TEXT is any human readible text. It may be unstructured data ("free text") or it may be generated from structured data ("auto text"). It may have different maximum length. It may occur in different LANGUAGEs and WRITING SYSTEMs.

stageSapCode.description: The SAP Code is the unique identifier from SAP to identify the data record for GLOBAL SKU STAGE.

skuStructure.title: stockKeepingUnitStructure
skuStructure.description: The Stock Keeping Unit Structure connects all Stock Keeping Units to be sold into the market with the Business Field Structure. This refers only to 3rd Party Business Field Structures.

newFormCodeName.title: newFormCode.name
newFormCodeName.description:
The term is the human readable unique name typically used in drop down menus of applications. 
In cases when the complete name is too long, then a meaningful abbreviation is created for the term.
English is the leading Language.

newFormCodeSapCode.title: newFormCode.sapCode

printedPackagingTypeSapCode.title: printedPackagingType.sapCode
printedPackagingTypeSapCode.description: The Code of the PRINTED PACKAGING MATERIAL (PPM) Type specifies which kind of PRINTED PACKAGING MATERIAL is managed with this LEGACY GLOBAL SKU.

printedPackagingTypeName.title: printedPackagingType.name
printedPackagingTypeName.description: The name of the PRINTED PACKAGING MATERIAL (PPM) Type specifies which kind of PRINTED PACKAGING MATERIAL is managed with this LEGACY GLOBAL SKU.

printAssignmentSapCode.title: printAssignment.sapCode

printAssignmentName.title: printAssignment.name
printAssignmentName.description: The name of the PRINT ASSIGNMENT. This indicates whether the packaging has a PRINT (artwork) or not
